Project Genesis Colors

Colors are:

  • easy to implement.
  • easy to read.
  • easier on the eyes than default web colors

#003399 $blue

#2AD8D3 $aqua

#145858 $teal

#4S6634 $olive

#006600 $green

#33cc33 $lime

#F4EE1C $yellow

#CC6600 $orange

#DDA02A $red

#800000 $maroon

#cc3399 $fuchsia

#541156 $purple

#E2E2E2 $silver

#A8A8A8 $grey

#161616 $black
